attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, 

The highly testosterone fueld and perverted chaps over at UKM would like to see Jojo 007 on the next Top Gear episode doing a car wash segment with the new Lambo or Ferrari.  Hell we dont care what car it is, could be a Morris Minor for that matter.

Just make sure it's a white tshirt and it's wet!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
